text: Yeh log kadi kadi qasmein kha kar kaha karte thay ke agar koi khabardar karne wala unke haan aa gaya hota to yeh duniya ki har dusri qaum se badh kar raast-ro(better-guided ) hotay. Magar jab khabardar karne wala inke paas aa gaya to uski aamad (coming) ne inke andar haqq se farar ke siwa kisi cheez mein izafa na kiya
